data.text: Ohhhh! He was the main character in Loving Vincent! Bit hard to recognize someone you've only seen as a moving oil painting.
Good gad, MATT SMITH IS IN THIS???  They must be paying bucket loads for Charles Dance as Mr Bennett as well. And I'm honestly trying to work out where I've seen this Mr Bingley before.

Today alone I've worked myself through Nailed it, a 4 part miniseries of Emma and now Pride and Prejudice and Zombies.

And I'm not so sure about my last choice. But I want to see how weird it gets. It definitely is one of those "surely they got bored during making this, right?"
